column4: there is a usb device shown at my computer, but i have netbook without any devices, i installed ubuntu via usb stick, powertop also says that this usb device is active 100% of the time so it is wasting power, how can i delete this device

there is a usb device shown at my computer, but i have a netbook without any devices, i installed ubuntu via usb stick, powertop also says that this usb device is active 100% of the time so it is wasting power, how can i delete this device?
